original_text: For as ye have drunk upon my holy mountain, so shall all the heathen drink continually, yea, they shall drink, and they shall swallow down, and they shall be as though they had not been.
korean_text: 너희가 내 성산에서 마신 것 같이 만국인이 항상 마시리니 곧 마시고 삼켜서 본래 없던 것 같이 되리라

sentences.original_text: For as ye have drunk upon my holy mountain
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 나의 거룩한 산에서 마신 것 같이

sentences.original_text: so shall all the heathen drink continually
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 모든 이방인들이 계속해서 마시게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: and they shall be as though they had not been
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 존재하지 않았던 것 같이 될 것이다
